Name: Old Retro Shooter
About the game: A shooter inspired by old shooters like Doom, Heretic. Your character appears in the maze, he has a choice of 4 types of weapons and bullets for him, you need to kill all the monsters in the maze to complete the game. When the bullets run out you will need to find new ones in the level. You can also find at the level of an increase in life and armor. Control the character with the WASD keys and the mouse. You have a set of weapons, pistols grenade launchers. Kill monsters. Find a way out of the maze. The character has lives and armor, find an increase in armor and lives to survive.
